top_comment.text:
Esse "Olá, classe" é de Ra-tim-bum e NÃO de Castelo Ra-tim-bum. São dois 
programas de TV completamente diferentes. O professor Tibúrcio (personagem 
que falava "olá, classe") era representado pelo Marcelos Tas no programa 
Ra-tim-bum.

O Tas também representava no Castelo Ra-tim-bum, mas outro personagem - o 
TeleKid.O Luque deve ter se confundido com os personagens do Tas ou então 
não faz a menor ideia do que se passava na programação do Castelo 
Ra-tim-bum. ﻿
top_comment.author: Ana Valasck

captions.text:
This is the "Styles Game", Elidio and
Luque will play. Stand up, please.
How does the "Styles Game" work?

They will start a scene,
I ring the bell,

and then we will switch
the style of the scene.

For that I'm gonna need
some help from the audience.

Anderson, I want you in that aisle,
Daniel, I want you in this aisle.

I want the audience to give them movie
styles so we can use them on stage.
Please. Andy!

- Tarantino!
- Tarantino. Daniel!

- Punk!
- Punk? Great. Anderson!

- Medieval and Charles Chaplin!
- Daniel!

- Horror!
- Horror. Anderson!

- Disney!
- Disney. Daniel!

- Rá-Tim-Bum Castle!
- Okay. You can come back.

Now I'm gonna need the
help form you in the corner,

I'd like a place where we
will start the "Styles Game".

'Parking garage'! That's where
the "Styles Game" will begin, now!

Buddy, I'm using the blinkers
for hours... No, no, no...

Sir, you have to wait for
this car to get out first.

But this car has just got in here! My
blinkers are on and he got in front of me!
He's returning, please,

can you back up a little bit
so we can get him out?

- Are you the parking manager?
- I'm the manager, that's right.

- But he can't get in there!
- He's 360 years old, give a break for the elderly!

- This is the young people's spot!
- I don't...
Horror!

- Did you say 360 years?
- Exactly. If I were you...
It's hard to maneuver in here...

Count, I have a friend
I'd like you to meet...

- Did you want my spot?
- It wasn't like this...
He did want your spot.
Disney!

A special spot! Come, I will
take you to another spot!
Geez!
Miska muska Mickey Mouse!

- It's a special spot!
- Yes!

- You don't need the regular parking garages...
- All our friends are here...

- You can come to this magical parking!
- It's the VIP spot!
I love you all!
Tarantino!

- I know this VIP spot has a price...
- It does!
And I want to know what price is this!
Tell him the price.
Medieval!
Why did you shot thy own king?
He's the enemy, he wants to replace me!
Oh, yes!
Easy, lad...
I'll be forced to kill your king!

- Wait...
- The carriage spot is not worth it!

- Who is the king?
- I am the king!

Right.
So back up a little bit, buddy.
Punk!
Hi, guys, I'm Avril Lavigne!
I'm outta references!
Rá-Tim-Bum Castle!
Hello, class!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

RICARDO REIS / ÁLVARO CAMPOS
